title: INCA KOLA - CON CREATIVIDAD - FONT
content: Does anyone know this font? I used to have it, but cannot remember name anymore. 2 samples shows below. Cheers in advance!
author: robertcooper

comments.content:
It must be **[Block Berthold (Condensed)](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005203920/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Berthold&ffam=Block%20Berthold%20-%20Condensed&fid=0c12a43f8ccb5ee61f96c1b8e3a955a8&fsize=60&text=CON%20CREATIVIDAD%20LAS%20DISTANCIAS%20NO%20EXISTEN!&wrap=2)** by Hermann Hoffmann (1908) - published by Berthold

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005203920/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
Thats it, great job. I was not aware of [http://www.findmyfont.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141005203920/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com/") Cheers!
